sense.gloss: one's own convenience, one's way, selfishness
surroundings, environment, way of doing things
right hand (in archery), hand that pulls the bowstring
unauthorised (e.g. phone app, WWW site), unofficial
overall victory, championship, winning the title
decision of a contest, finals (in sports)
consecutive victories, series of victories, winning streak
overwhelming victory, crushing victory, sweeping victory, landslide victory
winning a (legal) case, victory (in a legal case)
victory or defeat, outcome (of a game, battle, etc.)
to excel, to surpass, to exceed, to have an edge, to be superior, to outrival
selfishness, egotism, egoism, (being) self-centered, without consulting, (doing) as one pleases, one's own free will
easy peasy, child's play, cakewalk, walk in the park
victory or defeat, victory and defeat
to win, to achieve, to gain, to obtain, to secure
to conquer (e.g. an enemy), to defeat
taking the lead (in points, goals, etc.)
winning a tournament with no losses
kitchen door, back door, service door, tradesman's entrance
host's entrance to a tea-ceremony room
cause of victory, reason for (one's) success
prospects of victory, chances of success
to win and advance to the next round
picturesque scenery, place of scenic beauty
ease of use, user-friendliness, usability, utility, convenience
apt to (do), liable to, prone to, inclined to, tend to
... reaps the rewards, ... takes the prize, ... wins
katsuobushi, small pieces of sliced dried bonito
to win through (e.g. to the next round), to win game after game
to achieve a final victory, to fight to the end and win, to come out on top
to surpass, to outstrip, to excel
win of a low-ranked wrestler in the extra eighth bout in the tournament
chance to win, opportunity to win, chance of victory
gambling on whether the throw of a die will produce a "one" or a "six", gambling with dice
everybody for himself, everyone for themselves

sdata.j: ↑自分勝手↑↓じぶんがって↓にするつもりはない。
sdata.e: I don't intend to be selfish.

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓たちは↑戦↑↓たたか↓いに↑勝↑↓か↓った。
sdata.e: We won the battle.

sdata.j: この↑評論↑↓ひょうろん↓を↑優勝↑↓ゆうしょう↓↑作品↑↓さくひん↓に↑選↑↓えら↓んだ↑基準↑↓きじゅん↓は↑何↑↓なん↓ですか。
sdata.e: What criterion did you use when you elected this essay as the winner?

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓が↑絶対↑↓ぜったい↓↑勝↑↓か↓てないってあなた↑言↑↓い↓った？
sdata.e: Did you say that I could never win?

sdata.j: やった！↑2↑↓に↓↑回↑↓かい↓↑続↑↓つづ↓けて↑勝↑↓か↓っちゃった！
sdata.e: Yes! I won twice in a row!

sdata.j: ↑早↑↓はや↓まって↑喜↑↓よろこ↓ぶな、↑最後↑↓さいご↓に↑笑↑↓わら↓える↑者↑↓もの↓が↑勝↑↓か↓ち。
sdata.e: He laughs best who laughs last.

sdata.j: ↑勝手↑↓かって↓に↑何↑↓なん↓でも↑使↑↓つか↓って。
sdata.e: Make yourself at home.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑彼女↑↓かのじょ↓に、↑勝↑↓まさ↓るとも↑劣↑↓おと↓らずかわいい。
sdata.e: You are not less pretty than her.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑勝手↑↓かって↓に↑出↑↓で↓かけていいよ。
sdata.e: You are free to go out.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑勝手↑↓かって↓に↑好↑↓す↓きな↑事↑↓こと↓をしてよろしい。
sdata.e: You are welcome to do anything you like.

sdata.j: ↑勝手↑↓かって↓にすれば？
sdata.e: Do as you like.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓のチームには↑決勝↑↓けっしょう↓↑戦↑↓せん↓で↑勝↑↓か↓つチャンスはないよ。
sdata.e: Your team doesn't have a prayer to win the championship game.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓のチームが↑試合↑↓しあい↓に↑勝↑↓か↓ってうれしい。
sdata.e: I'm glad that your team won the game.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓にはちょっと↑荷↑↓に↓が↑勝↑↓か↓っているね。
sdata.e: I'm afraid this job is too much for you.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓たちのどっちが↑勝↑↓か↓つのだろう。
sdata.e: I wonder which of you will win.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓が↑勝↑↓か↓つとは↑限↑↓かぎ↓らない。
sdata.e: You may or may not win.

sdata.j: ↑驚↑↓おどろ↓いたことに↑勝↑↓か↓ってしまった。
sdata.e: To my great surprise, we won!

sdata.j: ↑驚↑↓おどろ↓いたことに↑私↑↓わたし↓↑達↑↓たち↓は↑勝↑↓か↓ってしまった。
sdata.e: To my great surprise, we won!

sdata.j: ↑恐↑↓おそ↓らく↑彼↑↓かれ↓は↑弁論↑↓べんろん↓↑大会↑↓たいかい↓に↑優勝↑↓ゆうしょう↓するだろう。
sdata.e: It is probable that he will win the speech contest.

sdata.j: ↑議論↑↓ぎろん↓では↑彼↑↓かれ↓に↑勝↑↓か↓つ↑者↑↓もの↓はいなかった。
sdata.e: No one could get the better of him in an argument.

sdata.j: ↑議論↑↓ぎろん↓では↑女↑↓おんな↓には↑勝↑↓か↓てぬ。
sdata.e: Women will have the last word.

sdata.j: ↑幾多↑↓いくた↓、↑苦戦↑↓くせん↓したのち、↑我々↑↓われわれ↓は↑勝利↑↓しょうり↓を↑収↑↓おさ↓め、↑新↑↓しん↓↑政府↑↓せいふ↓を↑樹立↑↓じゅりつ↓することができた。
sdata.e: After having fought many hard battles, we were able to bring home the bacon and set up a new government.

sdata.j: ↑寄↑↓よ↓る↑年波↑↓としなみ↓には↑勝↑↓か↓てないんだよ。
sdata.e: No one can turn the clock back.

sdata.j: ↑観衆↑↓かんしゅう↓はルチアーノを↑応援↑↓おうえん↓するかもしれないが、チャンピオンに↑勝↑↓か↓つ↑技術↑↓ぎじゅつ↓がある。
sdata.e: The crowd may be on the side of Luciano, but the champ has got the skill to win and that's what matters.

sdata.j: ↑僕↑↓ぼく↓は↑甘↑↓あま↓いものの↑誘惑↑↓ゆうわく↓に↑勝↑↓か↓てない。
sdata.e: I can't resist sweet things.

sdata.j: ↑乾坤一擲↑↓けんこんいってき↓の↑大↑↓だい↓↑勝負↑↓しょうぶ↓。↑情↑↓なさ↓けないけどこれが↑見事↑↓みごと↓↑空振↑↓からぶ↓りに↑終↑↓お↓わったんだなあ。
sdata.e: It was all-or-nothing and we struck out spectacularly.

sdata.j: ↑楽勝↑↓らくしょう↓だよ。
sdata.e: It's a piece of cake.

sdata.j: ↑各↑↓かく↓↑部門↑↓ぶもん↓の↑優勝↑↓ゆうしょう↓↑候補↑↓こうほ↓が↑集↑↓あつ↓まった。
sdata.e: The top favorites of each section were gathered together.

sdata.j: ↑我々↑↓われわれ↓は↑敵↑↓てき↓↑軍↑↓ぐん↓に↑勝↑↓か↓った。
sdata.e: We prevailed over our enemy.

sdata.j: ↑我々↑↓われわれ↓は↑勝利↑↓しょうり↓をかたく↑確信↑↓かくしん↓している。
sdata.e: We are firmly confident of victory.
